content:
# The waiting period has timed out without reaching the target of 30 iron plates, indicating that the furnace may not have been producing as expected. This could be due to the furnace being unable to process the iron ore effectively or an issue with the fuel supply.
# 
# I will check the furnace's fuel status and the number of iron plates produced to diagnose the issue.

# Inspecting the furnace again to check its fuel and output status.
furnace_status = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Checking the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Displaying the furnace's current status.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the current state of entities on the map.
